caption.title: Proportion of savings depending on the investment options and the endowments.
caption.p: a. Proportion of savings, mean and standard error of the mean (95% CI), at the end of the game per endowment and investment treatment. b. Differences of remaining capital −savings (S)− between the treatment 0-1-2-3-4 and 0-2-4 per endowment ( S 01234 − S 024 per endowment in each round).
Click here for additional data file.
